item.title: Blogs by R-Ladies
item.description:
Curated list of awesome blogs by R-Ladies.

The list lives in its own GitHub Repo, and you are very welcome to add your own! We even have an awesome mastodon bot occasionally posting links to posts from these blogs.

item.title: Coordinated by the Global Team
item.description: The majority of work for R-Ladies is done by the excellent chapter organisers around the world. For this, R-Ladies as a global organisation helps with technical infrastructure and a network the organisers can rely on for help and guidance if they need it.

item.title: International Womens Day Campaigns
item.description: R-Ladies Global has coordinated International Women Day actions to encourage more people from gender minorities to participate in the community on Twitter and to promote people in the community. The coordinators of these campaigns have written blog posts about them, which you can find links to below.
